resources.string: Unlock your tablet by looking at it

"Face matching is less secure than a pattern, PIN, or password
Someone who looks like you could unlock your tablet
The data used to recognize your face is kept private on your tablet"

"Find a spot indoors that's not too bright or too dim
Hold the tablet at eye level"
To unlock your tablet, just turn your screen on and look at the camera
Your tablet will unlock as soon as it recognizes you
Hold the tablet at eye level
